Ring Fit Adventure had the biggest jump in rankings in 2020

RPG launched in 2019 breaks through top 10 commonly dominated by legacy games

2020

2021

1: Monster Hunter Rise

2: Pokemon Brilliant Diamond / Shining Pearl
